meanings.definition: A leader or ruler, especially a dictator.
meanings.sent1: The fuhrer of the group made all the decisions.
meanings.sent2: The country's fuhrer was known for his strict rule.
meanings.sent3: The fuhrer of the book club decided to ban all mystery novels.
meanings.sent4: She was the fuhrer of the dance floor, commanding everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The fuhrer's presence was felt by all, his authority unquestioned.

meanings.definition: A person in a position of authority or control.
meanings.sent1: As the team's fuhrer, he guided them to victory.
meanings.sent2: The school principal was seen as the fuhrer of the students.
meanings.sent3: The fuhrer of the office snack stash was caught eating all the cookies.
meanings.sent4: She became the fuhrer of the household chores, organizing everything efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The fuhrer's presence in the meeting room demanded respect from all.
